text: [Music]
well if you can create a culture where
creativity is valued I think that that
goes along Long Way um I used to be on
the board of something called business
um committee for the Arts and one of the
programs that they initiated that we
embraced that I think is you know a
small way of doing that is something
called art at work where where um you
showcase literally the art that your
employees pursue in their spare time and
when we did it I remember thinking in
advance well we'll have a lot of
submissions from the people that work in
the creative Departments of our company
the people that work in the photo
department and the art Department etc
etc and of course that was true but what
was more surprisingly true were the
large numbers of people who had very
creative Hobbies that worked in accounts
payable or security or uh legal and I
think that in gendering that sense of
encouraging people to be creative in
that way and in all ways is is good
advice for every
company
